'''Sharad Kelkar''' is an Indian television actor who shot to fame mainly with his role as Nahar Pratap Singh in ''[[Saat Phere]] - Saloni ka Safar''. He also played the role of Rudra Raizada in ''[[Sindoor Tere Naam Ka]]'' on [[Zee TV]] at the same time.
He was the host for the show [[Pati Patni Aur Woh (TV series)]] on [[Imagine TV]] in 2009. <ref>[http://findarticles.com/p/news-articles/times-of-india-the/mi_8012/is_20090914/sharad-kelkar-host-pati-patni/ai_n39618719/ Sharad Kelkar to host 'Pati Patni Aur Who']</ref>
His recent role that got him critical acclaim for his performance as Thakur Digvijay Singh Bhadoria in the show produced by Balaji Telefilms titled ''[[Bairi Piya]]''. <ref>[http://www.tellychakkar.com/news/sharad-kelkar-offered-balaji-s-bairi-piya Sharad Kelkar offered Balajiâs Bairi Piya]</ref>
He also hosted ''[[Rock-N-Roll Family]]'' along with former Hero Honda ''[[Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Challenge 2007]]'' contestant [[Mauli Dave]]. <ref>[http://www.indiantelevision.com/release/y2k8/mar/marrel22.php Zee TV presents Rock N Roll Family], ''[[indiantelevision.com]]'' 08 March 2008.</ref>
Sharad is also part of Marathi film ''Chinu'' where he plays the hero to the female protagonist who plays the title role of ''Chinu''. <ref>[http://tellycafe.com/2011/08/07/sharad-kelkar-tejaswini-lonari-in-a-marathi-movie/ Sharad Kelkar Tejaswini Lonari in a Marathi movie]</ref>
==Early life and education==
Sharad hails from the city of [[Gwalior]] in [[Madhya Pradesh]]. <ref>[http://www.tellychakkar.com/y2k6/dec/2dec/interview.php I did think about why I was not even nominated: Sharad Kelkar], ''[[tellychakkar.com]]'' 02 December 2007.</ref> He has an MBA in Marketing

==Career== Sharad Kelkar was a Grasim Mr. India finalist.
In 2010, he participated in reality comedy TV series, ''[[Comedy Circus Mahasangram]]'' (2010) where partnered with Bharti Singh and [[Paresh Ganatra]].<ref>{{cite news|url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tv-/Comedy-Circus-Mahasangram-begins/articleshow/5538835.cms|title=Comedy Circus Mahasangram begins|date=Feb 6, 2010|work=The Times of India}}</ref>
His wife [[Keerti Gaekwad Kelkar]] is also a television actress who appeared in ''[[Saat Phere]]'' as Chandni / Devika in a negative role. Together, the couple also appeared on the dance reality show ''[[Nach Baliye 2]]''.
His most recent role has been that of Digvijay Thakur in [[Balaji Telefilms]] serial ''[[Bairi Piya]]'' aired on [[Colors (TV channel)]].
==Personal life== In June 2005 he married fellow actor and co-star Keerti Gaekwad (now [[Keerti Gaekwad Kelkar]]).
